attributes.action: Make dental and optical care free for people on disability living allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you can get free dental treatment  free eyecare and not pay prescription charges when you are on: 
Income Support 
Income-based Jobseeker’s Allowance 
Income-related Employment and Support Allowance 
Pension Credit Guarantee Credit;
then those on disability living allowance should also be entitled to free treatment.
It seems unfair really!
